subject: Baseball
Little League World Series
lead_paragraph: Shao-Fei Huang drove in six runs and Hsun Hao Shih hit two long home runs to lead Kaohsiung, Taiwan, to a 23-0 victory over Vancouver at the Little League World Series.
snippet: Shao-Fei Huang drove in six runs and Hsun Hao Shih hit two long home runs to lead Kaohsiung, Taiwan, to a 23-0 victory over Vancouver at the Little League World Series.
